snippet: FRIEDMAN--Gary Ross MD. On March 2, 2016 of Bayville New York. At the age of 62. Beloved wife of Valerie. Loving father of Nicole, Joshua, Molly and Laura. Cherished son of Ethel and The late Mel Friedman. Adored brother of Harvey Friedman and Carol Goodman. Services Sunday, 10am at Gutterman's, 8000 Jericho Tpk., Woodbury, LI. 1/3
lead_paragraph: FRIEDMAN--Gary Ross MD. On March 2, 2016 of Bayville New York. At the age of 62. Beloved wife of Valerie. Loving father of Nicole, Joshua, Molly and Laura. headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FRIEDMAN, GARY ROSS MD
